hero.title: Program & Social Project
hero.subtitle: 10 Pillars to Transform the Central African Republic
hero.description: An ambitious, concrete and realistic program to build a strong, prosperous and sovereign nation

intro.title: A Global Vision for National Renaissance
intro.description: Our program is based on 10 strategic pillars that cover all aspects of national life. From security to justice, from education to energy, each axis is designed to address current challenges and build the future we deserve.

pillars.title: The 10 Pillars of the Program
pillars.subtitle: Concrete commitments for profound and lasting transformation

defense.title: Defense & National Security
defense.subtitle: Restore sovereignty and protect the national territory
defense.point1: Construction of strategic military cities at borders to secure the territory
defense.point2: Complete re-equipment of FACA, Police and Gendarmerie with modern equipment
defense.point3: Reopening of military schools and training centers to strengthen capacities
defense.point4: Significant increase in Defense budget to ensure operational effectiveness
defense.point5: Creation of a secure national identification database
defense.point6: Mandatory identification for all residents on national territory

security.title: Internal Security & External Intelligence
security.subtitle: Modernize security and intelligence services
security.point1: Systematic and controlled identification at entry to national territory
security.point2: Complete modernization of intelligence services and National Police
security.point3: Mandatory declaration of births and deaths throughout the country
security.point4: Implementation of a secure and centralized database
security.point5: Strengthening regional and international cooperation in security matters
security.point6: Continuous training of security agents in modern techniques

diplomacy.title: Diplomacy & Foreign Relations
diplomacy.subtitle: Assert the Central African Republic's place on the international stage
diplomacy.point1: Strategic review of all bilateral and multilateral agreements
diplomacy.point2: Assignment of diplomats based on strict criteria of competence and merit
diplomacy.point3: Creation of a National Diaspora Agency to mobilize skills
diplomacy.point4: Strengthening partnerships with African countries and regional organizations
diplomacy.point5: Promotion of the Central African Republic's image internationally
diplomacy.point6: Development of economic and cultural cooperation

social.title: Social Policy, Education, Health & Youth
social.subtitle: Invest in human capital to build the future
social.point1: Implementation of Universal Health Coverage (UHC) for all citizens
social.point2: Complete rehabilitation of hospitals and health centers throughout the territory
social.point3: Rehabilitation and construction of modern schools, middle schools, high schools and universities
social.point4: Free and compulsory schooling up to a defined age to guarantee access to education
social.point5: Enhancement of study scholarships for all young people without exclusion
social.point6: Creation of youth training centers in all prefectures

infrastructure.title: Public Infrastructure, Roads & Development
infrastructure.subtitle: Modernize the country and connect regions
infrastructure.point1: Development of a National Architectural Plan for harmonious development
infrastructure.point2: Rehabilitation and construction of modern roads, bridges and highways
infrastructure.point3: Construction of railways: Bangui-Douala and Bangui-Khartoum
infrastructure.point4: Creation of the Autonomous Port of Mongoumba to facilitate trade
infrastructure.point5: Construction of modern administrative centers in all prefectures
infrastructure.point6: Rehabilitation and construction of international airports

aid.title: Management of External Aid
aid.subtitle: Transparency and efficiency in resource utilization
aid.point1: Creation of a special BEAC account dedicated to managing external aid
aid.point2: Legal security of all public and private contracts
aid.point3: Strict control and rigorous monitoring of construction site execution
aid.point4: Total transparency in the management of international financing
aid.point5: Regular publication of fund utilization reports
aid.point6: Relentless fight against corruption and embezzlement of funds

culture.title: Culture, Arts, Communication & Public Media
culture.subtitle: Promote cultural identity and unleash creativity
culture.point1: Construction of cultural and craft centers in all prefectures
culture.point2: Erection of a new Statue of Peace and modernization of the National Museum
culture.point3: Complete modernization of national radio and television channels
culture.point4: Creation of training schools for journalists and media technicians
culture.point5: Satellite broadcasting of public media for national coverage
culture.point6: Support for artists, creators and cultural actors

agriculture.title: Agriculture & Livestock
agriculture.subtitle: Modernize the agricultural sector and ensure food security
agriculture.point1: Complete mechanization of agriculture to increase productivity
agriculture.point2: Industrialization and packaging of agricultural products for export
agriculture.point3: Creation of agricultural training schools in all regions
agriculture.point4: Establishment of a National Directorate of Agricultural Products
agriculture.point5: Development of modern livestock farming and animal sectors
agriculture.point6: Facilitation of access to credit and inputs for farmers

energy.title: Energy Policy & Electrification
energy.subtitle: Light up the entire country and exploit our natural resources
energy.point1: Responsible and transparent management of mineral resources (diamond, gold, etc.)
energy.point2: Massive development of hydroelectric, photovoltaic and wind power
energy.point3: Complete electrification of cities and rural areas
energy.point4: Creation of schools and training centers in energy and electricity
energy.point5: Rational exploitation of oil and construction of national refineries
energy.point6: Promotion of renewable energy and energy efficiency

justice.title: Justice & Press
justice.subtitle: Guarantee the rule of law and freedom of expression
justice.point1: Guarantee of an independent and impartial Justice for all
justice.point2: Recognition of the Press as the 4th power and guarantee of its freedom
justice.point3: Relentless fight against corruption and impunity at all levels
justice.point4: Significant increase in Justice and Media budgets
justice.point5: Modernization of courts and continuous training of magistrates
justice.point6: Protection of journalists and promotion of investigative journalism

vision.title: Our Vision for the Central African Republic
vision.description: A 21st century Central African Republic, dignified, stable and sovereign. A country where every citizen can live in security, access quality services and contribute to national development.
vision.point1: Visionary leadership in service of the people and the nation
vision.point2: Concrete and realistic solutions for today's challenges
vision.point3: A united, prosperous and respected Central African Republic in the world
vision.point4: A profound and lasting transformation for future generations

cta.title: Our Time Has Come
cta.description: Together, let's make history! Join the movement to build the Central African Republic we deserve.

hero.title: Youth at the Heart of Our Project
hero.subtitle: Over 60% of the population is under 25 years old
hero.description: This youth is not a problem, it is our greatest wealth! It will be at the heart of our national transformation project.

intro.title: A Generation That Carries the Future
intro.description: Central African youth is talented, creative and determined. Our mission is to provide them with the means to succeed: quality education, professional training, decent jobs, accessible healthcare and spaces for cultural and sports development.
intro.stat: ðŸŽ¯ Over 60% of the Central African population is under 25 years old â€” This is our greatest strength!

education.title: 1. Modern and Accessible Education for All
education.subtitle: A renovated, equipped and free education system up to a certain level
education.point1: Rehabilitation and modernization of all schools, middle schools and high schools throughout the national territory
education.point2: Complete reconstruction and equipment of universities with modern infrastructure, digital libraries and laboratories
education.point3: Free and compulsory schooling up to a defined age to guarantee access to education for all children
education.point4: Enhanced scholarships for all young people without exclusion, with a merit and social equity system

formation.title: 2. Professional Training and Future Opportunities
formation.subtitle: Skills adapted to the needs of the 21st century and growth sectors
formation.point1: Creation of youth training centers in all prefectures to bring training closer to populations
formation.point2: Technical training in key sectors: mechanized agriculture, modern livestock, renewable energy, communication and security
formation.point3: Technological upgrading with training in digital professions, media, design and innovation
formation.point4: Partnerships with international institutions for recognized certifications and academic exchanges

employment.title: 3. Youth Employment & Entrepreneurship
employment.subtitle: Making youth the engine of reconstruction and economic growth
employment.point1: Massive integration of young people in national reconstruction sectors: infrastructure, agriculture, energy, local industries
employment.point2: Creation of incubators and business nurseries in all regions with technical and financial support
employment.point3: Facilitated access to financing for young entrepreneurs through dedicated funds, micro-credits and subsidies
employment.point4: National professional integration program guaranteeing a first job or paid internship for young graduates

highlight.title: Thousands of Jobs Created in Growth Sectors
highlight.description: Mechanized agriculture, agro-food processing, mining, oil, solar energy, construction, tourism, crafts, digital and services.

health.title: 4. Health, Social Protection & Well-Being
health.subtitle: A healthy youth is a productive and fulfilled youth
health.point1: Universal access to healthcare through Universal Health Coverage (UHC) for all young people
health.point2: Complete rehabilitation of hospitals, health centers and equipment with modern medical equipment
health.point3: Prevention and awareness programs on reproductive health, STIs/HIV and mental health

culture.title: 5. Cultural, Sports and Creative Development
culture.subtitle: Unleashing the artistic and sports potential of Central African youth
culture.point1: Construction of cultural centers, craft centers and cultural houses in all prefectures
culture.point2: Creation of spaces dedicated to youth: recording studios, creative workshops, sports fields and modern sports infrastructure
culture.point3: Financial and logistical support for artists, young talents, content creators and high-level athletes
culture.point4: Organization of festivals, national sports competitions and cultural events to promote local talent

cta.title: Join the Youth Movement
cta.description: Together, let's build the Central African Republic we deserve. Your voice matters, your talent matters, your future matters.
